pageContext.claim: “Half a million more Hispanic Americans now own a home, and we've never seen these kind of numbers before.”
pageContext.analysis: There was a gain of 362,000 in the number of Hispanic owner households in 2018 and a total gain of 538,000 in 2017 and 2018. Contrary to Trump's claim neither of these numbers are all-time highs. There was a gain of 414,000 Hispanic-owned households in 2002 and 404,000 in 2005, both higher than 2018. The total gain for 2004 and 2005 was 679,000, exceeding the total for 2017 and 2018.
